reference.title: Server groups API
reference.shortdesc: The server groups REST API refers to the Rack Zone Awareness feature, which enables logical groupings of servers on a cluster where each server group physically belongs to a rack or availability zone.

section.title: Description
section.p: This feature provides the ability to specify that active and corresponding replica partitions be created on servers that are part of a separate rack or zone. For purposes of the server group REST API, racks or availability zones are represented as flat space of server groups with group names. To enable Rack Awareness, all servers in a cluster must be upgraded to use the Rack Awareness feature.
section.note: The Rack Awareness feature with its server group capability is an Enterprise Edition feature.
section.p: The Server groups REST API provides the following capability:

row.entry: Retrieves information about a server group.
Creates a server group with a specific name.
